purpose: To orchestrate AI functionalities in Web3 applications, enhancing development through modular AI integration with blockchain systems
principle: Builds on a modular framework that integrates AI models with blockchain technologies, enabling complex multi-agent orchestration
reusability: Designed to be modular and extensible, allowing developers to integrate it with existing Web3 applications and blockchain platforms
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for certain blockchain platforms, and requires technical expertise to configure
name: CMA
description: OmniAgent Framework is an advanced, modular AI orchestration system that transforms Web3 development by seamlessly integrating artificial intelligence with blockchain technologies.
highlight: Seamless integration of AI with blockchain technologies for Web3 development
